dict.string:
Allows scrolling of SpringBoard & folders before animations have finished. Made after reading a few requests on r/jailbreak.
[v.1] Tested w/iP6+ 8.1 & 8.4. (7-28-15)
⚑ UPDATES: (6-5-15) *Initial release (7-28-15) *Confirmed working on 8.4
(FYI, you don't need to use this patch if you already use Tage or any similar tweak that also seems to use this method.)
● If you'd like to donate via PayPal, please send money to...
☞ goin730@gmail.com
Allow SB Scroll While Animating ₇₋₂₈₋₁₅
